brainly_data.question: How did women gain the right to vote change the portal of male and female Dynamics in literature
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question: How did women gain the right to vote change the portal of male and female Dynamics in literature
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: Women in literature began to take a more drastic role in the progression of plot. Often the way women were written began to take on a more bold and heroic tone. The interactions between characters of different genders became less about men asking things of women, but women asking things if men.

top_answer.text: Women in literature began to take a more drastic role in the progression of plot. Often the way women were written began to take on a more bold and heroic tone.
